name: Holy Roman Empire
declaringWar: I cannot wait until ye grow even mightier. Therefore, prepare for war!
attacked: I will not relish this coming war, but I will win it.
defeated: Alas, I must submit to your triumph over me, and bid you congratulations, farewell, and the burden of my imperial throne.
introduction: Ah, welcome. I didn't see you there at first. I am Ferdinand I, Holy Roman Emperor and King in Germany, King of Hungary, Bohemia, Dalmatia, Croatia, Archduke of Austria, Duke of Burgundy, Margrave of Moravia, and... well, you get the idea. Oh, and King of Slavonia, too.
hateHello: Your presence is a foul thing.
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
uniques: [-20]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]
